column5: My wife and I are going camping the 4th-6th, she does not have a fishing license.  I dont think she is going to go fishing the rest of the year so im not sure if its worth her getting one or not.  ANyway, question?  Is this the family weekend  sport or conservation regulations?  Thanks to anyone who may know!  Cheers!
yeah makes sense.  Not that we are going to keep anything anyway but just in case.  THanks!  Cheers!
